The core cache caches data used internally by OpenCms in the server's memory. It is a conglomeration of various internal caching mechanisms. For example, it caches user specific data or resource specific data like properties.

The cache can be configured via the opencms-system.xml, but usually the default configuration is sufficient. The core cache can be flushed via the cache administration. That may be necessary in some situations. Think of it if you experience unintended behavior when working with OpenCms.
